Translations.Text: When ili seg gxi okaz vizagx de those disbelieved turn miserable proklam This est ki vi uz mok
Dir DI decid annihilate me those withme dusx us kun His mercy est tie protekt disbelievers painful retribution
dir Li est plej Gracious; ni kred en Him ni fid Him. Vi do gxi surely trov out who est really far astray
Dir Ki se your akv sinks for who proviz vi do gxi pur akv
Vi ating great ben el your Lord vi ne est crazy
Your Lord est fully aware da those who strayed His path Li est fully aware da those direkt
Ili wish vi compromise ili tro compromise
Eben kvankam li posed suficx mon infan
When our revelations recited him li dir Tales el preter
